list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Update dependencies and Jest configuration.
Upgraded "react-router-dom" to v7.6.3 and added "@jest/core" and "jest-environment-jsdom" for improved test framework compatibility. Adjusted Jest settings to better support TypeScript and React Testing Library. Commented out test execution in the CI workflow, potentially for future revision or optimization.

task.summary: Default task

Refactor inventory and orders tables; remove unused components.
Revised inventory and orders table components for improved reusability, including new configuration-driven headers and hover effects. Removed unused `BasicTableOne` and refactored sidebar for new inventory sections. Added pages for product and component inventory, refined loading UI, and updated configurations for consistency.

Add sorting and enhancements to inventory components view
This update introduces sorting of components based on a predefined SKU order and improves the table layout with better column styling. Additional changes include handling checkbox functionality, adding error handling, and enabling forced updates for re-fetching components.

Refactor product and inventory views; enhance auth handling.
Introduces `ProductSheet` and refactors `PInventory` for improved data handling and UI. Updates authentication flow with explicit `logout` and `signin` functionality, removes redundant auto-login, and adjusts navigation. Sidebar structure and API services are updated for better consistency across components.

Add authentication context and enhance product data support
Introduced `AuthContext` to manage authentication state and wrapped the application in `AuthProvider`. Expanded product data structure and updated `ProductSheet` table with new fields and enhanced columns. Adjusted header and dropdown components to respond to authentication state.

Make product sheet table editable and enhance state management
Added support for inline editing of product sheet fields and updated the table column definitions to handle grouped components. Introduced value mapping functions, persistent login via localStorage, and API integration to update product details dynamically. Updated configurations and utility functions to support these changes.

Remove SignUp page and integrate user and permission management
The SignUp page was removed from the application as it is no longer necessary. New pages were added for managing users and permissions, enhancing administrative functionality. Adjustments were made to the sidebar, authentication context, and routing to support these updates and the dynamic display of menu items based on the user's role.

Refactor User API handling and implement user updates
Moved User API logic to a dedicated service file for better modularity. Added functionality to update user details via API and handle potential errors. Adjusted components to integrate with the new structure and ensure only applicable users can be edited.

Refactor User API handling and implement user updates
Moved User API logic to a dedicated service file for better modularity. Added functionality to update user details via API and handle potential errors. Adjusted components to integrate with the new structure and ensure only applicable users can be edited.

Add image management and modal functionality to ProductSheet
Introduced an "Edit Images" modal for managing product images, along with handlers for saving changes. Updated table styling, added image-related interfaces, and enhanced product data mapping to include images and components. Included Roboto font and related adjustments in `tailwind.config.js`.

Refactor modals and update image handling logic
Moved `ProductImageModal` to a dedicated folder and introduced a new `ComponentModal`. Enhanced image handling with reordering functionality and streamlined component structure. Added updates to dependencies and environment configuration.

Add LPN Management page and Virtual Keyboard integration
Implemented a new LPN Management page with a responsive data grid for LPN data. Introduced a virtual keyboard component for enhanced user input and added relevant CSS for styling. Refactored and removed unused Shopify components and updated dependencies for better functionality.

Add new features for LPN requests and label printing
Updated NewLPN.tsx to include PDF generation and label printing functionality. Introduced a new button variant "normal" and adjusted UI elements to support submission state and VirtualKeyboard integration. Minor style changes were also applied to the virtual keyboard and container layout.

Add ZPL label generation and printing functionality
Implemented ZPL label creation for LPN requests and UPC-based SKU labels. Enhanced UI with print button and updated input focus handling to reset specific fields.

Add user creation and LPN management features
Implemented user creation modal with role selection and validation. Enhanced LPN management with location-based put away functionality and UI updates. Adjusted navigation structure and introduced new interfaces for improved state handling.

Add `useErrorHandler` hook and enhance error handling
Introduced a reusable `useErrorHandler` hook for consistent error management and notification handling across components. Updated LPN-related components to use this hook, simplifying error handling logic and improving code maintainability. Adjusted input fields to trim whitespace on user input for better data consistency.

Add LPN search, putaway, and breakdown functionalities
Introduced components for searching, putting away, and breaking down LPNs. Refactored LPN-related logic to improve modularity and maintainability, updated API services, and enhanced UI interactions. Minor layout adjustments and error handling improvements were also implemented.

Add LPN search, removal, and history tracking functionality
Integrated LPN search and deletion features to enhance inventory management. Deprecated unused product search in AppHeader and streamlined the sidebar with a new "History" section. Includes UI adjustments and API integration for improved data handling.

Refactor History and Count & Search modules
Reorganized and optimized the History module by replacing `LPNLog` with `LpnHistory`. Added a new Count & Search feature with functionality to search by SKU. Adjusted routing, sidebar navigation, and reused the API to improve maintainability.

Add CI/CD workflow for build and deploy to VPS
This commit introduces a GitHub Actions workflow for automating build and deployment processes to a VPS. It includes steps for testing, building, and deploying the application while also updating the `.gitignore` to exclude `.env` files. Additionally, `.env` configuration was adjusted for a local environment setup.

Remove package-lock.json from .gitignore
The exclusion of package-lock.json ensures it is tracked in the repository. This change aligns with the use of npm as the package manager, improving dependency consistency.

Remove package-lock.json from .gitignore
The exclusion of package-lock.json ensures it is tracked in the repository. This change aligns with the use of npm as the package manager, improving dependency consistency.

Add lint scripts, improve CI setup, and fix test environment
Added lint and lint:fix npm scripts for better code quality management. Enhanced CI workflow to handle multiple lock files and conditionally run linting. Fixed test environment by adding global TextEncoder and TextDecoder to setupTests.ts.

Refactor CI/CD workflow to modular job structure
Split the build pipeline into modular jobs for better readability and maintainability. Introduced caching for `node_modules` and cleaned up redundant steps. Added artifact uploads and cleanups to optimize deploy and post-deploy processes.

Update workflow to trigger only on pull requests and upgrade action
The workflow no longer triggers on direct pushes to the main branch, reducing unnecessary runs. Additionally, the upload-artifact action was upgraded to version 4 for improved performance and compatibility.

Update GitHub Actions to use v4 of artifact actions
Upgraded `actions/download-artifact` and `actions/upload-artifact` from v3 to v4 in the workflow file. This ensures compatibility with the latest features and improvements in these actions.

Update GitHub Actions to use v4 of artifact actions
Upgraded `actions/download-artifact` and `actions/upload-artifact` from v3 to v4 in the workflow file. This ensures compatibility with the latest features and improvements in these actions.

Update GitHub Actions to use v4 of artifact actions
Upgraded `actions/download-artifact` and `actions/upload-artifact` from v3 to v4 in the workflow file. This ensures compatibility with the latest features and improvements in these actions.

Update artifact paths in GitHub Actions workflow
Modified the upload and download artifact paths to explicitly handle the `.env` file. This change ensures the correct environment file is transferred during the CI/CD process. No other workflow steps were affected.

Update CI workflow to streamline .env management and dependencies
Reorganized .env generation by integrating it directly into relevant steps and added directory content verification for debugging. Adjusted build dependencies to include linting and tests, ensuring pre-build checks are complete. Enhanced artifact handling for better workflow clarity and reliability.

Add dependency verification and fallback installation steps
This update ensures `react-scripts` is verified before the build process and logs available npm scripts for debugging purposes. It also adds a fallback mechanism to install dependencies if `node_modules` is missing or incomplete, improving the workflow's reliability.

Add dependency verification and fallback installation steps
This update ensures `react-scripts` is verified before the build process and logs available npm scripts for debugging purposes. It also adds a fallback mechanism to install dependencies if `node_modules` is missing or incomplete, improving the workflow's reliability.

Add dependency verification and fallback installation steps
This update ensures `react-scripts` is verified before the build process and logs available npm scripts for debugging purposes. It also adds a fallback mechanism to install dependencies if `node_modules` is missing or incomplete, improving the workflow's reliability.

Add dependency verification and fallback installation steps
This update ensures `react-scripts` is verified before the build process and logs available npm scripts for debugging purposes. It also adds a fallback mechanism to install dependencies if `node_modules` is missing or incomplete, improving the workflow's reliability.

Add dependency verification and fallback installation steps
This update ensures `react-scripts` is verified before the build process and logs available npm scripts for debugging purposes. It also adds a fallback mechanism to install dependencies if `node_modules` is missing or incomplete, improving the workflow's reliability.

Set module type and update TypeScript target to ESNext
Added "type": "module" to package.json for native ESM support. Updated tsconfig.json to use ESNext for both target and module, improving compatibility with modern JavaScript features. Excluded node_modules in tsconfig.json to avoid unnecessary processing.

Set module type and update TypeScript target to ESNext
Added "type": "module" to package.json for native ESM support. Updated tsconfig.json to use ESNext for both target and module, improving compatibility with modern JavaScript features. Excluded node_modules in tsconfig.json to avoid unnecessary processing.

Update dependencies, add Babel config, and adjust CI workflow
Added `@babel/plugin-proposal-private-property-in-object` and updated `axios` to version 1.8.2. Introduced a `.babelrc` file for Babel configuration. Adjusted CI workflow to include `run-tests` as a dependency for the `generate-env` job.

Switch to Jest for testing and update dependencies
Replaced React Scripts testing with Jest and added Jest configuration. Updated package dependencies to align with the changes and ensure compatibility. Introduced necessary Babel and Jest-related devDependencies for proper testing environment setup.

Switch to Jest for testing and update dependencies
Replaced React Scripts testing with Jest and added Jest configuration. Updated package dependencies to align with the changes and ensure compatibility. Introduced necessary Babel and Jest-related devDependencies for proper testing environment setup.

Switch to Jest for testing and update dependencies
Replaced React Scripts testing with Jest and added Jest configuration. Updated package dependencies to align with the changes and ensure compatibility. Introduced necessary Babel and Jest-related devDependencies for proper testing environment setup.

Refactor Babel configuration and cleanup package.json.
Moved `@babel/plugin-proposal-private-property-in-object` from dependencies to Babel plugins in `babel.config.js` to streamline configuration. Removed unnecessary dependency from package.json and updated associated files for consistency.

Remove Babel configuration file
The `.babelrc` file is deleted as it is no longer needed. This change suggests the project no longer relies on Babel for compilation, likely due to a migration to a different build tool or preset.

Remove Babel configuration file
The `.babelrc` file is deleted as it is no longer needed. This change suggests the project no longer relies on Babel for compilation, likely due to a migration to a different build tool or preset.

Update dependencies and Jest configuration for compatibility
Upgraded "react-router-dom" to version 7.6.3 and added "@jest/core" and "jest-environment-jsdom" to align with the new test framework updates. Adjusted Jest configuration to better support TypeScript and React Testing Library. This ensures improved compatibility and stability with the latest library versions.

Update dependencies and Jest configuration.
Upgraded "react-router-dom" to v7.6.3 and added "@jest/core" and "jest-environment-jsdom" for improved test framework compatibility. Adjusted Jest settings to better support TypeScript and React Testing Library. Commented out test execution in the CI workflow, potentially for future revision or optimization.

Add LPN Management page and Virtual Keyboard integration
Implemented a new LPN Management page with a responsive data grid for LPN data. Introduced a virtual keyboard component for enhanced user input and added relevant CSS for styling. Refactored and removed unused Shopify components and updated dependencies for better functionality.

Add new features for LPN requests and label printing
Updated NewLPN.tsx to include PDF generation and label printing functionality. Introduced a new button variant "normal" and adjusted UI elements to support submission state and VirtualKeyboard integration. Minor style changes were also applied to the virtual keyboard and container layout.

Add ZPL label generation and printing functionality
Implemented ZPL label creation for LPN requests and UPC-based SKU labels. Enhanced UI with print button and updated input focus handling to reset specific fields.

Add user creation and LPN management features
Implemented user creation modal with role selection and validation. Enhanced LPN management with location-based put away functionality and UI updates. Adjusted navigation structure and introduced new interfaces for improved state handling.

Add `useErrorHandler` hook and enhance error handling
Introduced a reusable `useErrorHandler` hook for consistent error management and notification handling across components. Updated LPN-related components to use this hook, simplifying error handling logic and improving code maintainability. Adjusted input fields to trim whitespace on user input for better data consistency.

Add LPN search, putaway, and breakdown functionalities
Introduced components for searching, putting away, and breaking down LPNs. Refactored LPN-related logic to improve modularity and maintainability, updated API services, and enhanced UI interactions. Minor layout adjustments and error handling improvements were also implemented.

Add LPN search, removal, and history tracking functionality
Integrated LPN search and deletion features to enhance inventory management. Deprecated unused product search in AppHeader and streamlined the sidebar with a new "History" section. Includes UI adjustments and API integration for improved data handling.

Refactor History and Count & Search modules
Reorganized and optimized the History module by replacing `LPNLog` with `LpnHistory`. Added a new Count & Search feature with functionality to search by SKU. Adjusted routing, sidebar navigation, and reused the API to improve maintainability.

Add CI/CD workflow for build and deploy to VPS
This commit introduces a GitHub Actions workflow for automating build and deployment processes to a VPS. It includes steps for testing, building, and deploying the application while also updating the `.gitignore` to exclude `.env` files. Additionally, `.env` configuration was adjusted for a local environment setup.

Remove package-lock.json from .gitignore
The exclusion of package-lock.json ensures it is tracked in the repository. This change aligns with the use of npm as the package manager, improving dependency consistency.

Added lint and lint:fix npm scripts for better code quality management. Enhanced CI workflow to handle multiple lock files and conditionally run linting. Fixed test environment by adding global TextEncoder and TextDecoder to setupTests.ts.

Refactor CI/CD workflow to modular job structure
Split the build pipeline into modular jobs for better readability and maintainability. Introduced caching for `node_modules` and cleaned up redundant steps. Added artifact uploads and cleanups to optimize deploy and post-deploy processes.

Update workflow to trigger only on pull requests and upgrade action
The workflow no longer triggers on direct pushes to the main branch, reducing unnecessary runs. Additionally, the upload-artifact action was upgraded to version 4 for improved performance and compatibility.

Upgraded `actions/download-artifact` and `actions/upload-artifact` from v3 to v4 in the workflow file. This ensures compatibility with the latest features and improvements in these actions.

Modified the upload and download artifact paths to explicitly handle the `.env` file. This change ensures the correct environment file is transferred during the CI/CD process. No other workflow steps were affected.

Update CI workflow to streamline .env management and dependencies
Reorganized .env generation by integrating it directly into relevant steps and added directory content verification for debugging. Adjusted build dependencies to include linting and tests, ensuring pre-build checks are complete. Enhanced artifact handling for better workflow clarity and reliability.

Add dependency verification and fallback installation steps
This update ensures `react-scripts` is verified before the build process and logs available npm scripts for debugging purposes. It also adds a fallback mechanism to install dependencies if `node_modules` is missing or incomplete, improving the workflow's reliability.

Set module type and update TypeScript target to ESNext
Added "type": "module" to package.json for native ESM support. Updated tsconfig.json to use ESNext for both target and module, improving compatibility with modern JavaScript features. Excluded node_modules in tsconfig.json to avoid unnecessary processing.

Update dependencies, add Babel config, and adjust CI workflow
Added `@babel/plugin-proposal-private-property-in-object` and updated `axios` to version 1.8.2. Introduced a `.babelrc` file for Babel configuration. Adjusted CI workflow to include `run-tests` as a dependency for the `generate-env` job.

The `.babelrc` file is deleted as it is no longer needed. This change suggests the project no longer relies on Babel for compilation, likely due to a migration to a different build tool or preset.
